articles.content: Oil prices inched higher on Wednesday, extending the previous day's rally, after industry data showed U.S. crude stocks fell more than expected last week, though a bigger-than-anticipated build in pr… [+1984 chars]

articles.title: Airtel Business teams up with Adani Energy Solutions, to power smart meters - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Adani Energy Solutions will get around 20 million smart meters powered by Airtel Business, Bharti Airtel's B2B arm.
articles.content: As Adani Group companies continue to expand their business in different sectors, Adani Energy Solutions is now seeking rival firm Bharti Airtel's help to set up and power smart meters for the company… [+2134 chars]

articles.title: India pushing its textiles through free trade deals - Deccan Herald
articles.description: India pushing its textiles through free trade deals
articles.content: Under the PM-MITRA scheme, seven mega textiles clusters are proposed to be set up in as many states Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Telangana, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh and Maharashtra.

articles.title: World Bank Leaves India GDP Growth Forecast Unchanged At 6.3% - NDTV Profit
articles.description: India is expected to maintain the fastest growth rate among the world’s largest economies, but its post-pandemic recovery is expected to slow, the World Bank says.
articles.content:
The World Bank left India's GDP growth forecast unchanged while reaffirming India's position as the world's fastest-growing major economy.

articles.title: Bajaj Auto tops M&M in m-cap to regain 3rd largest auto co tag - The Economic Times
articles.description: The market capitalisation of one of the countrys largest two- and three-wheeler makers surged to Rs 2.09 lakh crore on Tuesday, crossing M&Ms market value of Rs 2.03 lakh crore. Maruti Suzuki is the most valuable automaker, followed by Tata Motors.
articles.content: Bajaj Auto has pipped Mahindra & Mahindra to become the third most valuable automobile company in India intraday on Tuesday after nearly 20 months.The market capitalisation of one of the countrys… [+2320 chars]

articles.title: Tata Motors Global Wholesales Up 9% In Q3 - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The company's global sales of all passenger vehicles, including electrical vehicles, were at 1,38,455 units, up 5% year-on-year.
articles.content: The company's global sales of all passenger vehicles, including electrical vehicles, were at 1,38,455 units, up 5% year-on-year.
